title: [Bug] from_dict treats falsy timestamp values (False, 0, None) as empty string, causin
summary: Fix was already present in codebase - Todo.from_dict already uses dict.get(key, default) pattern which preserves falsy values. Added regression tests to verify the fix works correctly.
verification_commands: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_minimal_framework.py
